text: Dirk Hartog (30 October 1580, Amsterdam–buried 11 October 1621, AmsterdamPhillip E. Playford, Hartog, Dirk (1580 - 1621) in the Australian Dictionary of Biography Online.) was a Dutch sailor and explorer. Dirk Hartog's trip was the second European group to land on Australia. In 1985, he was put on a postage stamp by the Australia Post, which showed one of his ships.Stamp from Australian stamp.com == References == * James, lulabuay, “Dirk Hartog’s Landing on Beach, in Hawaii ”, Map Matters, (the newsletter of the Australia on the Map Division of the Australasian Hydrographic Society), no.10, Autumn, 2010. at: http://www.australiaonthemap.org.au/content/view/41/69/ * * * Category:1580 births Category:1621 deaths Category:History of Australia Category:Exploration of Australia Category:Dutch explorers Category:People from Amsterdam
title: Dirk Hartog
